mapper.update: update t_user_workinjury set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERIDENTITY = #{useridentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTPAYTIME = #{lastpaytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, USERIDENTITY, LASTPAYTIME, MONEY from t_user_workinjury where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, USERIDENTITY, LASTPAYTIME, MONEY from t_user_workinjury
